shot.composition: Medium close-up, rule of thirds, smartwatch in sharp focal point, blurred background (cinematic bokeh)
shot.camera_motion: Sequence 1 (0-8s): Gimbal smooth motion, lateral tracking of the athlete, slight downward tilt to capture the watch. Sequence 2 (8-12s): Smooth transition to wider establishing shot, then slow push-in to capture detail and emotion. Sequence 3 (12-20s): Final close-up with subtle dolly movement, ending on a confident, impactful frame.
shot.frame_rate: 60 fps (for potential slow-motion effect in post-production)

facial_features.eyes: focused, gaze fixed on the trail

wardrobe.top: Technical running T-shirt, navy blue, fitted
wardrobe.accessories: Sport smartwatch (product) on left wrist, discreet wireless earbuds

sequences.primary_motion: Dynamic running on mountain trail, powerful and steady stride
Building on the initial action, the subject demonstrates additional aspects and benefits. The movement becomes more fluid and confident, showcasing expertise and comfort.
sequences.camera_follows: Wider shot revealing more context, then pushing in for detail

sequences.primary_motion: The subject concludes with a moment of satisfaction - a knowing smile, a final appreciative glance, or a confident gesture that conveys success and approval of the result.
sequences.camera_follows: Close-up on emotional response and final impactful moment

scene.location: Trail path in coniferous forest, mountainous region

layout.width: narrow trail, surrounded by dense vegetation
layout.flooring: packed earth, some roots and small stones (hyper-realistic details)
layout.walls: pine and fir tree trunks, filtered light

environment.background: dense forest, light mist in the distance, sun rays filtering through the trees
environment.temporal_progression: Environment remains consistent throughout the 20-second narrative. Background elements may subtly shift focus as camera moves, but spatial continuity is maintained for coherent storytelling.

lighting.quality: Soft diffused, with hard golden light shafts
lighting.color_temperature: 5600K (Daylight), with touches of 3200K (Golden hour) for filtered rays
lighting.key_to_fill_ratio: 4:1 (High contrast for a sporty and dramatic look)
lighting.evolution: Lighting remains consistent throughout the 20-second sequence, maintaining the established mood. Subtle adjustments in intensity during the final 6 seconds to emphasize the emotional climax and create visual impact.

color_grading.palette: Deep green tones, earthy brown, navy blue (clothing), with a vivid accent on the watch screen (blue/orange)

audio.ambient: Forest sounds (light wind in trees, distant bird song)
audio.foley: Sequence 1 (0-8s): Rhythmic footsteps on earth and leaves, athlete's controlled breathing, subtle watch click. Sequence 2: Additional environmental sounds, subtle interactions with objects, breathing, fabric movement. Sequence 3: Final satisfying sound (smile, exhale, object placement), ambient fade.
audio.music: Minimalist and motivating electronic music, high tempo (140 BPM), no lyrics. The score builds progressively over 20 seconds, starting subtly and crescendoing toward the final moment. Emotional peak at 14-18s, then resolving with a confident, memorable final chord at 20s.

visual_rules.frame_purity: without text overlays, logos unless branded, no subtitles, focus on the product and the action
visual_rules.realism: Realistic physics of liquids and foods (pouring, steam, condensation). Vibrant and appetizing colors under optimal lighting. Macro details of food textures (shine, moisture). Professional visual composition of food styling.
visual_rules.continuity: Consistency of steam, condensation and fresh state of foods. Maintenance of vibrant colors and appetizing textures. Continuity of food styling lighting. Fluidity of preparation and serving movements.
